subject: Photo album
author: benjamin tait
full_text:
The 4 pics in my album were taken at my home on 10/31 and 11/2/06.
Feel free to send me any thoughts on them at all.
Please keep in mind that when the photos were snapped...MO one was 
smokeing and the camera that I used had no strap ( yes....You know that 
you're a Ghost Hunter when....type of thing. HAHA)
